question: NBA: Charlotte Hornets vs. Detroit Pistons 2023-02-27
description:
In the upcoming NBA game, scheduled for February 27 at 7:00 PM:

If the Charlotte Hornets win, the market will resolve to “Hornets”.

If the Detroit Pistons win, the market will resolve to “Pistons”.

 If the game is not completed by April 16, 2023 (11:59:59 PM EST), the market will resolve 50-50.

question: Will Arsenal beat Everton? (03/01/2023)
description:
In the upcoming Premier League soccer match scheduled for March 1, 2023:

If Arsenal wins, this market will resolve to "Yes". Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

If the game results in a draw, the market resolves to "No."

If the game is not completed by March 15, 2023, the market will resolve to 50-50.

events.title: Premier League (03/01/2023)
events.description: This is a market group on who will win Premier League fixtures scheduled for March 1, 2023.
